Name: Jackson
description: Jackson is a married man. He has five children. He describes himself as hardworking. He operates a farm where he grows crops. His primary customers are local residents. He describes his family's challenge to be a lack of enough water for domestic use. He will use this 38,000 KES loan to buy a water tank for storing clean water for domestic use. He hopes that in the future, he will be successful in farming. This is his third loan with SMEP DTM. Jackson's previous loan of 60,000 KES was repaid successfully.
